page.title: 10Sampford Brett Crafts.
page.content: The{Arts and Crafts}Festival is held once a year in June on Tuesday till Saturday.Some of the people enter things which{include,paintings, {pottery,copper and pewter,knitwear, {soft toys,wooden toys,needlework, {woodwork,tapestry,smocking and {sculpture.} Over 500 people visit in a week.Every day they have a different demonstrator to show how you can make things which included sculpting with stone,needlework etc.They get a lot of people who come from the village and throughout Somerset.You pay 2p to get in.Some of the things on display are for sale. They have{music}in the Church on Tuesday at 8.00pm and each year they have a different sort of music.One year, girls from St.Audries school played their musical instruments.
